      Parameters:

      isMine - set true if the player is the same as the one who is connected with this client instance

    • isToRefresh

      private boolean isToRefresh​(java.lang.String username)
      Parameters:
      username - name of the player
      Returns:
      true if the playerboard needs to be refreshed, false otherwise

      private boolean isMine​(java.lang.String username)

      username - name of the player
